faq.title: Here you will find answers to frequently asked questions about our IT consulting services.

questions.question: What is IT consulting?
questions.answer: IT consulting is the professional consulting of companies in questions of information technology. We support you in planning, implementing and optimizing your IT strategy.

questions.question: How long does it take?
questions.answer: The duration of the consulting depends on the complexity of your company and the number of questions. We can usually present you with a report with our results and recommendations within 2-4 weeks.

questions.question: What industries do you serve?
questions.answer: We serve all industries that need an individual IT strategy to achieve their business goals. We support you in developing and implementing IT solutions tailored to your needs.

questions.question: How does the cooperation work?
questions.answer: We work in a team and advise you together. We advise you in all questions of information technology and support you in implementing your IT strategy.

questions.question: What technologies do you use?
questions.answer: We use the latest technologies and methods to optimize your IT strategy. We advise you in all questions of information technology and support you in implementing your IT strategy.
